plot: Maolajuding is a legendary hero of the Uighur people and was able to trick corrupt officials into freeing his lover from a tyrannical landlord.
title: Afanti er shi
plot_es: Maolajuding is a legendary hero of the Uighur people and was able to trick corrupt officials into freeing his lover from a tyrannical landlord.
plot_en: Maolajuding is a legendary hero of the Uighur people and was able to trick corrupt officials into freeing his lover from a tyrannical landlord.
